=Motivation=

We want to filter the genes on *GeneOntology*

=Solution=

Create a 'File Re' node reading a QuickGoURL:

e.g: http://www.ebi.ac.uk/QuickGO/GAnnotation?tax=9606&relType=IP=&goid=GO:0001654&format=tsv

[https://knime4bio.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/GeneOntology01.png]

Then join  (Join Node) this table with another table using the gene symbols


[https://knime4bio.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/GeneOntology02.png]
